PropertyList.title: Boeing 707
PropertyList.text:
_________ Boeing 707-420 __________
The first development of this Aircraft was from Innis Cunningham. This version is a revamp from this original. Nearly everthing is written and painted new. Also the jsb. But ... It is more easier to write and paint a model, if you have the old one to copy and past the "blueprints". Have fun wis Innis Cunningham revamps 707.
